string-array.name: dishDetailsComplete
string-array.item: Cooked quinoa is combined with kale, red onion, red bell pepper, cucumber, feta cheese, and pumpkin seeds. Top it with an olive oil and lemon juice dressing and toss to combine.
Mushrooms stuffed with a delicious filling, topped with grated cheese and baked to perfection. You can serve these stuffed mushrooms as a snack or appetiser for your next dinner party.

Idli is a popular south-Indian recipe and most of us like to include it in our breakfast. While you must be familiar with all the classic idli recipes, here we bring you a healthy and nutritious beetroot idli that is a must-try!

Large vegetarian feasts, called Vishu Sadhya, are prepared to commemorate the joyous occasion. This Nutritious Jackfruit and Spinach Sambar recipe by Sivapriya Balagopal â€“ Head of Spices Innovation, ECPL is exciting and a complete package of health and a zesty flavour and a must try for Vishu, this year.
Beetroot is jam-packed with nutrients and vitamins, as well as plenty of disease-preventing properties. Here we bring you an easy recipe of making beetroot amla juice at home.
